summary: Verified that Beauty module IS rendering correctly in server-side HTML. Test shows both modules (Demo and Beauty) are present in rendered HTML with 2 module items found. The issue is browser cache showing old HTML. Added try-catch blocks for route() calls to prevent silent failures. All server-side caches cleared. User needs to do a hard browser refresh (Ctrl+Shift+R) to see the Beauty module.
current_status: Beauty module is correctly rendered in server-side HTML. Both modules appear in the compiled view. Server-side rendering is working. The user is seeing cached HTML in their browser. Hard browser refresh required to see changes.
